channel.title: Item Duplicating
channel.description:
Hi I need to know how to duplicate item for 2 reasons: 1-. Curiosity 2-. Stop it on my server
I know its not artmoney becouse when you bank or drop it goes back to normal, i know its not ::pickup or ::setitem couse those commands are autoban in my server and it wont let them do it so then how do those dupers ruin my server economy? I need to know this for not to ruin my next server economy

item.title: Item Duplicating

item.description:
@renatoavalos wrote:

lol i did that but with setitem and pickup exept for admins but how do you dupe it with client drop? is just laggs it

Read full topic
